trans-unit.source: Contains response information returned by a peer resolver as the result of a registration operation.

When <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Register%2A> (or an implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.IPeerResolverContract.Register%2A>) is called with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo> instance passed to it, this object is returned to the caller to indicate the results of the registration operation.
Instances of this class are primarily used to pass registration response information from the resolver service to a network client of that service.
Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterResponseInfo"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterResponseInfo"></xref> class with the supplied registration ID and lifetime.
<xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that uniquely identifies the newly-registered peer.
<xref href="System.TimeSpan"></xref> that specifies the lifetime of the peer's registration.
Indicates whether the body of the message containing a serialized instance of this type is correctly formed.
True if the registration response information body is correctly-formed by the sender; false if it is not.
Gets or sets a GUID that uniquely identifies the newly-registered peer.
<xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that uniquely identifies the newly-registered peer.
Gets or sets the amount of time before a registration expires and is removed by the resolver service.
<xref href="System.TimeSpan"></xref> that specifies the lifetime of the peer's registration.
